properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_ID, TITLE, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, LIKED, RP_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(BOARD_WRITER=USER_NO) AND B.STATUS='Y' AND CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND NOTICE = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_ID, TITLE, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, LIKED, RP_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(BOARD_WRITER=USER_NO) AND B.STATUS='Y' AND CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND NOTICE = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, LIKED, RP_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ? AND NOTICE = 'N'
UPDATE BOARD SET LIKED = LIKED+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_WRITER, CATEGORY_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, NOTICE) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, 1, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_TYPE) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, 1)
SELECT FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = ?, CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_TYPE) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, 1)
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REPLY(RP_NO, REF_BNO, RP_WRITER, CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_RPNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT RP_NO, USER_ID, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "CREATE_DATE" FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(RP_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = ?
